channel.title: Personal on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on madewhere

item.title: Braun
item.description: Braun manufactures a line of shaving and hair care products, made in Germany. They are also the parent company of Oral-B, which provides a line of electric toothbrushes.

item.title: Oral-B
item.description: Oral-B manufactures a number of their toothbrush lines in Europe; any that fall under the “Pro”, “Professional Care”, and “Triumph” lines. However they do not prominently list the origin of each product, and details can be difficult to find.

item.title: Seki Edge
item.description: Tweezers, shears, nail clippers, and other personal care products. In the United States, Seki Edge is distributed by Jatai.
